channel.title: Connection problem
channel.description: A friend and I are trying to connect to my server, I connect fine, but he cannot connect. I have my ip set to my routers ip momentarily, as I do not have no-ip atm. I login fine, yet he is still stuck at "Checking for Updates - 1%" and I do not know how to fix it. does it have to do with me using my router's ip vs no-ip or something? btw this is a 667/704 base. All help is appreciated.

item.title: Connection problem
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

you need to pput your computers ip in the client and server, go to www.whatismyip.org, copy the ip and paste in server and client, make sure that you get a client with ip 127.0.0.1, or you can’t log in

Read full topic
